content: Hi All, I am looking for a link from where I can download all the base R4 profiles which are provided in the FHIR specification as a single package. Is any such link available?
what is the significance of fhir.schema.json(attached screenshot) which is available inside definition.json Uploading fhirSchemaQuery.PNGâ€¦
I am new to healthcare domain and Fhir . Can you please tell me the difference between structure definition and schema in Fhir
we are looking for a link from where we can download all the structure definitions in one shot which can be uploaded and validated against a FHIR server

hi Neha
I can't view your uploaded image for some reason.
A structure definition is FHIR's full original definition of a resource (like the source code for it). A schema (json or xml/xsd) is another way to represent that structure, in a less complete way, but that more common industry tooling can deal with. The schemas are created from the structure definitions. Only FHIR specific tooling can deal with structure definitions.
Did you find the FHIR downloads page that is referenced above your post?
You can see some information about what JSON can handle and can't here: http://build.fhir.org/validation.html
Not sure if this is even the right stream, just trying to see what would cause this error " The package 'hl7.fhir.uv.cpg' has no entry on the current build server."
